author: Slidebean
description:
An OpenAI board member just quit after appearing in the Epstein files.

Larry Summers, former Treasury Secretary and OpenAI board member, is stepping down after leaked emails revealed disturbing ties to Jeffrey Epstein, including Epstein calling himself Summers’ “wingman.”

OpenAI loves to preach about “AI safety,” but maybe start with basic human safety and don’t put Epstein’s email buddy on your board.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: OpenAI board drama: Epstein emails just took down Larry Summers

author: Slidebean
description:
Jeff Bezos is back and he’s building agentic AI in stealth mode.

Bezos just launched Prometheus, a $6.2B AI company focused on agentic AI, systems that don’t just answer questions, but take actions for you.

No website. No details. Total stealth.
Just exactly what the world needed: another billionaire building Skynet.

Elon responded by calling him a copycat, so now the two Bond villains are fighting again.
The AI arms race isn’t slowing down, it’s leveling up.


👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: Bezos is building a new AI company and Elon is already jealous
